column3: Call me a crazy liberal, but is there any reason this method shouldn't be public like the others in this helper class?

I ended up wanting this method for a custom Annotator, and had to just re-implement it inside my plugin. Yay open source, but why not just let people use it where it is, and thus get updates to the code as well?
This method should belong to some utility class then. ControlFlowUtils is a good candidate.
@donnerpeter - indeed, I have! Kindly pardon the delay. :)
@jonnybot0 looks good to me, thank you!

Have you submitted a contributor license agreement?
If not, please follow the steps described at http://www.jetbrains.com/agreements/cla/ to sign it.
I believe I have. Is there some way to indicate/prove that?
@jonnybot0 Unfortunately I'm not able to find you in our contributors list. Could you please submit again?

I've used static import to preserve the git history in GroovyTypeCheckVisitor.
eddf087

Thank you for the contribution!
This change will be available in the build next week.
Move isImplicitReturnStatement to ControlFlowUtils and make public
